page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: A great part of the area is farmland, with a mixture of arable and dairy farms and 1 Summer fruit farm.There is only one village with a small population and few facilities.The populated area is a mixture of old and new houses.Some of the houses were built around 1850 and there is some house building being carried out now. The area includes a hospital centre and a staff club and a large sports and social club owned by one of the 4 main brewery companies in Burton-on-Trent . There are 5 schools including the small village school of Anslow.There are several small shops in the area but there is no main shopping or meeting place.
